# âš™ï¸ Configuration Guide

Learn how to add content and customize your documentation using simple formatting options.

## ğŸ’» Adding Your Content

### **How to Create New Pages:**

1. **Open your language file** (e.g., `src/lang/en.json`)
- To create a new language go to `/src/hooks/useLanguage.ts` and do the following:
```Typescript
const AVAILABLE_LANGUAGES = [
    { code: 'en', name: 'English', flag: 'ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸' },
    { code: 'pl', name: 'Polish', flag: 'ğŸ‡µğŸ‡±' },
    // Add more languages here
].map(lang => ({
    ...lang,
    code: lang.code.toLowerCase(),
    name: lang.name,
    flag: lang.flag
}))
```
2. **Find the `content` section**
3. **Add a new page:**

```json
"content": {
  "my_new_page": {
    "title": "My New Page",
    "description": "A brief description of what this page covers",
    "content": "# Welcome\n\nYour content goes here..."
  }
}
```

### **Adding Multiple Pages:**

For sections with multiple pages:

```json
"my_section": {
  "title": "My Section Title",
  "pages": {
    "1": {
      "title": "Introduction",
      "description": "Getting started with...",
      "content": "# Introduction\n\nContent here..."
    },
    "2": {
      "title": "Advanced Topics",
      "description": "Deep dive into...",
      "content": "# Advanced\n\nMore content..."
    }
  }
}
```

2.content:
# ğŸš€ Installation Guide

## ğŸ“¥ Clone Repository

```bash
git clone https://github.com/MILKv2/easydocs.git
cd easydocs
npm install
npm run build
```

## ğŸŒ Deploy to Pages

### **Cloudflare Pages:**
1. Install wrangler (if not installed)
```bash
npm install -g wrangler
```
2. Login to Cloudflare
```bash
wrangler login
```
3. Publish your site
```bash
npm run deploy
```
